text: The group stage of the 2009 CAF Champions League was played from 18 July to 20 September 2009. A total of eight teams competed in the group stage, the group winners and runners-up advance to the Knockout stage playing semifinal rounds before the final. ==Format== In the group stage, each group was played on a home-and-away round-robin basis. The winners and the runners-up of each group advanced to the Knockout stage. ==Groups== {|class="wikitable" !Key to colours in group tables |- bgcolor=#ccffcc |Group winners and runners-up advance to the Knockout stage |} ===Group A=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ===Group B=== \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==References== ==External links== *2009 CAF Champions League - todor66.com Group stage
title: 2009 CAF Champions League group stage
